objective.text: Steal box with the documents from block commander.
Robbed rookie near the ruined plant is looking for the weapon to avenge the bandits
You must find and kill Gunslinger.
Dealer is looking for the rare artifact “Night star”. Find and deliver it to him and in exchange he will gather for you information about Gunslinger.
Dealer arranged for you a meeting with a stalker that may know something about Gunslinger group. Meet him at the garage near garbage.

game_task.title: Get the documents from the Research Institute “Agroprom”.

objective.text: You must get military documents and deliver them to barmen in stalkers bar.
Get the military documents from Research Institute “Agroprom”.
Deliver military documents to barmen in stalkers bar.
You got the information about Gunslinger group. Some of the members are situated near Research Institute “Agroprom”. They may lead you to Gunslinger.
Find and search Gunslinger group cache. There may be some information about Gunslinger whereabouts.
